tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE packaging_defects (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    defect_type VARCHAR(50),
    defect_location VARCHAR(100),
    date_recorded TIMESTAMP,
    quality_rating INT
);

CREATE TABLE packaging_defects (
    id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    date DATE,
    defect_type VARCHAR(255),
    location VARCHAR(255),
    severity INT
);

CREATE TABLE products (
  product_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  product_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  product_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
  production_date DATE,
  shelf_life_days INTEGER
);

CREATE TABLE inspections (
  inspection_id SERIAL PRIMARY KEY,
  defect_id INTEGER,
  product_id INTEGER,
  inspection_date DATE,
  inspector_name VARCHAR(100) NOT NULL,
  inspection_result VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL
);

CREATE TABLE inspections (
  inspection_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  product_id INT,
  location_id INT,
  defect_id INT,
  inspection_date DATE,
  is_defective BOOLEAN
);

CREATE TABLE packaging_defects (
    defect_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    defect_type VARCHAR(50),
    defect_description TEXT,
    defect_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE defect_analysis (
    analysis_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    defect_id INT,
    analysis_timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    analysis_notes TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE production_line (
    line_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    line_name VARCHAR(50),
    line_description TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE inspection_records (
    record_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    line_id INT,
    inspection_date DATE,
    inspector_name VARCHAR(50),
    defect_id INT
)

CREATE TABLE defect_patterns (
    pattern_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    pattern_name VARCHAR(50),
    pattern_description TEXT,
    pattern_count INT
)
